guide..."},{"lineNumber":179773,"originalJapaneseLine":"その場で土下座をした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Dropped down on the spot to prostrate action..."},{"lineNumber":179777,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんでだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Why not?"},{"lineNumber":179778,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あのシャングリラには身の毛もよだつ","translatedEnglishLine":"In that army..."},{"lineNumber":179781,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔人ケイブリスでございます……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is the demon lord I-I'm so sorry!"},{"lineNumber":179784,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どこにいるかと思えば、","translatedEnglishLine":"I was wondering where he was hiding,"},{"lineNumber":179785,"originalJapaneseLine":"　砂漠にこそこそと隠れていたか」","translatedEnglishLine":"and turns out he's sneaking around in the here."},{"lineNumber":179787,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なに？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What?"},{"lineNumber":179788,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケイブリスは魔軍総大将だけあり、","translatedEnglishLine":"Caveblis is the supreme commander of the demon army,"},{"lineNumber":179789,"originalJapaneseLine":"　強さはトップクラスと聞きます」","translatedEnglishLine":"and I hear his strength is at the very top."},{"lineNumber":179790,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうですね、サテラさん」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's right, Satella."},{"lineNumber":179791,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm..."},{"lineNumber":179792,"originalJapaneseLine":"聞かれたサテラが不愉快そうに眉をひそめた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella frowned displeasedly when she heard that."},{"lineNumber":179793,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……悔しいが……な」","translatedEnglishLine":"...It's frustrating, but..."},{"lineNumber":179794,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケイブリスは魔人四天王の筆頭、","translatedEnglishLine":"Caveblis is the leader of the four demon kings,"},{"lineNumber":179795,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人の中でも最古参にして……最強だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"one of the longest-serving and strongest demons."},{"lineNumber":179796,"originalJapaneseLine":"「時期を待ち、今は先延ばしにすることも","translatedEnglishLine":"We could wait for the right time and postpone the attack a little,"},{"lineNumber":179797,"originalJapaneseLine":"　多少なら可能ですが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"but only to some extent..."},{"lineNumber":179798,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……時期を待てば勝てるのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"...If we wait for the right time, can we do it today or tomorrow, it makes no difference."},{"lineNumber":179801,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なら、早い方がいい」","translatedEnglishLine":"So it's better to do it sooner."},{"lineNumber":179802,"originalJapaneseLine":"「敵の元を断つ！","translatedEnglishLine":"We'll cut off the enemy's source!"},{"lineNumber":179803,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シャングリラを攻めるぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's attack Shangri-La!"},{"lineNumber":179804,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そして、魔人ケイブリスをブッ殺して","translatedEnglishLine":"And then we'll kill the demon lord Caveblis,"},{"lineNumber":179805,"originalJapaneseLine":"　全ての戦いをスーッキリ終わらせる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"and put an end to all battles cleanly!"},{"lineNumber":179806,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははははははははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":179807,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケイブリスなんぞ楽勝だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Caveblis is an easy win!"},{"lineNumber":179808,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ふん、よく言った」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmph, well said."},{"lineNumber":179809,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それでこそサテラの使徒だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's the disciple of Satella!"},{"lineNumber":179810,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":179811,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……分かりました。","translatedEnglishLine":"...Understood."},{"lineNumber":179812,"originalJapaneseLine":"　少し臆病になっていたかも知れませんね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Perhaps I had become a bit cowardly."},{"lineNumber":179813,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私達の命、総統に預けます」","translatedEnglishLine":"We entrust our lives to you, Commander."},{"lineNumber":179814,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう……ようやく全部終わるんですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh... finally, it will all be over..."},{"lineNumber":179815,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、行くぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahaha, let's go!"},{"lineNumber":179816,"originalJapaneseLine":"「砂漠のシャングリラで","translatedEnglishLine":"At the desert Shangri-La,"},{"lineNumber":179817,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人ケイブリスと決戦だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"we will have a decisive battle with the demon lord Caveblis!"},{"lineNumber":179818,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達がゼス側からキナニ砂漠に到着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others arrived at the Kinani Desert from the Zes side."},{"lineNumber":179819,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っ、くーーーっ！　暑いなここは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh, gahh! It's hot here!"},{"lineNumber":179820,"originalJapaneseLine":"「暑いというより、むしろ熱い、です、ね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Rather than hot, it's actually scorching, isn't it...?"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 狙われ続けまして……こ、怖くて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've been targeted continuously... It's s-scary...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とてもとても表には出られず……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I really couldn't go outside at all...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、臆病者め」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, you coward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが立ち上がる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance stood up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、これで次に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, with this, we now know where to attack next.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻め込むべき場所が分かったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We've identified the place we should invade next.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今からババーンとシャングリラに攻め込むぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From now, we'll charge straight into Shangri-La!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして魔軍の増援などストップだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And we'll stop any reinforcements to the demon army!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひぃぃぃぃっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eeeek!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……こら、案内人やかましいぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, guide, stop being so noisy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やる気が削がれるだろうが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're killing the morale here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砂漠案内人は突然、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, the desert guide...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その場で土下座をした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dropped down on the spot to prostrate himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いい、いやしくも案内人風情である私が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Listen, I am but a humble guide,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統閣下様にご進言させて頂きますれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and if I may offer counsel to your Excellency the Commander,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そそそそ、そのようなことは勧めませぬ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-I-I'm afraid I cannot recommend such a course of action...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんでだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why not?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あのシャングリラには身の毛もよだつ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In that Shangri-La, there lurks a terrifying monster that will make your hair stand on end...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐ろしい化け物がいるのでございます……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A dreadful creature indeed...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、魔軍の総大将……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: T-the supreme commander of the demon army...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人ケイブリスでございます……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is the demon lord Caveblis...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケイブリスだと！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Caveblis!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はひぃぃぃ！　ももも、申し訳ありません！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-yes! I-I'm so sorry!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どこにいるかと思えば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was wondering where he was hiding,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砂漠にこそこそと隠れていたか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and turns out he's sneaking around in the desert.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統、ここは慎重にご判断願います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Commander, please make your decision carefully here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なに？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケイブリスは魔軍総大将だけあり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Caveblis is the supreme commander of the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 強さはトップクラスと聞きます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and I hear his strength is at the very top.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですね、サテラさん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, Satella.
Hmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞かれたサテラが不愉快そうに眉をひそめた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella frowned displeasedly when she heard that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……悔しいが……な」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...It's frustrating, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケイブリスは魔人四天王の筆頭、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Caveblis is the leader of the four demon kings,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人の中でも最古参にして……最強だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: one of the longest-serving and strongest demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「時期を待ち、今は先延ばしにすることも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We could wait for the right time and postpone the attack a little,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多少なら可能ですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but only to some extent...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……時期を待てば勝てるのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...If we wait for the right time, can we win?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日やろうと明日やろうと変わらん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whether we do it today or tomorrow, it makes no difference.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら、早い方がいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So it's better to do it sooner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「敵の元を断つ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll cut off the enemy's source!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャングリラを攻めるぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's attack Shangri-La!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、魔人ケイブリスをブッ殺して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then we'll kill the demon lord Caveblis,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全ての戦いをスーッキリ終わらせる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and put an end to all battles cleanly!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははははははは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスなんぞ楽勝だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Caveblis is an easy win!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ふん、よく言った」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, well said.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでこそサテラの使徒だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's the disciple of Satella!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……分かりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Understood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し臆病になっていたかも知れませんね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps I had become a bit cowardly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私達の命、総統に預けます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We entrust our lives to you, Commander.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう……ようやく全部終わるんですね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... finally, it will all be over...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、行くぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahaha, let's go!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「砂漠のシャングリラで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the desert Shangri-La,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケイブリスと決戦だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we will have a decisive battle with the demon lord Caveblis!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がゼス側からキナニ砂漠に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others arrived at the Kinani Desert from the Zes side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っ、くーーーっ！　暑いなここは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, gahh! It's hot here!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「暑いというより、むしろ熱い、です、ね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rather than hot, it's actually scorching, isn't it...?

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 狙われ続けまして……こ、怖くて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've been targeted continuously... It's s-scary...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とてもとても表には出られず……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I really couldn't go outside at all...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、臆病者め」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, you coward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが立ち上がる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance stood up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、これで次に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, with this, we now know where to attack next.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻め込むべき場所が分かったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We've identified the place we should invade next.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今からババーンとシャングリラに攻め込むぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From now, we'll charge straight into Shangri-La!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして魔軍の増援などストップだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And we'll stop any reinforcements to the demon army!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひぃぃぃぃっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eeeek!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……こら、案内人やかましいぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, guide, stop being so noisy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やる気が削がれるだろうが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're killing the morale here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砂漠案内人は突然、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, the desert guide...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その場で土下座をした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dropped down on the spot to prostrate himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いい、いやしくも案内人風情である私が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Listen, I am but a humble guide,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統閣下様にご進言させて頂きますれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and if I may offer counsel to your Excellency the Commander,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そそそそ、そのようなことは勧めませぬ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-I-I'm afraid I cannot recommend such a course of action...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんでだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why not?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あのシャングリラには身の毛もよだつ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In that Shangri-La, there lurks a terrifying monster that will make your hair stand on end...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐ろしい化け物がいるのでございます……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A dreadful creature indeed...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、魔軍の総大将……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: T-the supreme commander of the demon army...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人ケイブリスでございます……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is the demon lord Caveblis...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケイブリスだと！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Caveblis!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はひぃぃぃ！　ももも、申し訳ありません！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-yes! I-I'm so sorry!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どこにいるかと思えば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was wondering where he was hiding,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砂漠にこそこそと隠れていたか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and turns out he's sneaking around in the desert.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統、ここは慎重にご判断願います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Commander, please make your decision carefully here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なに？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケイブリスは魔軍総大将だけあり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Caveblis is the supreme commander of the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 強さはトップクラスと聞きます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and I hear his strength is at the very top.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですね、サテラさん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, Satella.
Hmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞かれたサテラが不愉快そうに眉をひそめた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella frowned displeasedly when she heard that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……悔しいが……な」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...It's frustrating, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケイブリスは魔人四天王の筆頭、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Caveblis is the leader of the four demon kings,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人の中でも最古参にして……最強だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: one of the longest-serving and strongest demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「時期を待ち、今は先延ばしにすることも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We could wait for the right time and postpone the attack a little,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多少なら可能ですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but only to some extent...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……時期を待てば勝てるのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...If we wait for the right time, can we win?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日やろうと明日やろうと変わらん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whether we do it today or tomorrow, it makes no difference.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら、早い方がいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So it's better to do it sooner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「敵の元を断つ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll cut off the enemy's source!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャングリラを攻めるぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's attack Shangri-La!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、魔人ケイブリスをブッ殺して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then we'll kill the demon lord Caveblis,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全ての戦いをスーッキリ終わらせる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and put an end to all battles cleanly!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははははははは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスなんぞ楽勝だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Caveblis is an easy win!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ふん、よく言った」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, well said.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでこそサテラの使徒だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's the disciple of Satella!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……分かりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Understood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し臆病になっていたかも知れませんね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps I had become a bit cowardly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私達の命、総統に預けます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We entrust our lives to you, Commander.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう……ようやく全部終わるんですね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... finally, it will all be over...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、行くぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahaha, let's go!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「砂漠のシャングリラで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the desert Shangri-La,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケイブリスと決戦だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we will have a decisive battle with the demon lord Caveblis!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がゼス側からキナニ砂漠に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others arrived at the Kinani Desert from the Zes side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っ、くーーーっ！　暑いなここは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, gahh! It's hot here!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「暑いというより、むしろ熱い、です、ね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rather than hot, it's actually scorching, isn't it...?
